name: Deep Memory (LD #48 Full)
description:
This is the full version of my compo participation to the Ludum Dare #48. If you want to play the compo version of it, follow the link below :

https://gastoune.itch.io/deep-memory-compo

Deep Memory is a short point'n'click game where you embody an amnesic child who's lost in a hospital. You doesn't remember anything and you think you're far from home. 

Find some clues in the hospital to retrieve your memory and go back home.

Music :

Title:  Marée

Author: Kai Engel

Source: https://soundcloud.com/kaiengel

License: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/deed.fr

Download (8MB): https://auboutdufil.com/?id=604
